TEXT.TITLE: RECEIVER NAMED FOR SEAWAY'S LEVY-RUSSELL UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Seaway Multi-Corp Ltd said Peat Marwick Ltd was appointed receiver-manager of its operating subsidiary, Levy-Russell Ltd, after it was unable to meet the Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce's demand for repayment of loans totaling about 20 mln dlrs. It said the receiver is seeking offers for the sale of Levy-Russell as a going concern. Reuter
